Package com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.communicate

Class C2sCommunicator

java.lang.Object
com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.communicate.C2sCommunicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Deprecated public class C2sCommunicator extends Object implements Serializable
Deprecated.
In a future release, this class, its functions and its properties will become internal to the SDK.
Handles all communication with the Online Payments Client API.
See Also:

    • getBasicPaymentProducts

      public ApiResponse<BasicPaymentProducts> getBasicPaymentProducts(PaymentContext paymentContext, android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves BasicPaymentProducts from the Online Payments gateway without any fields.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary data to retrieve the correct BasicPaymentProducts
      Returns:
      BasicPaymentProducts, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getPaymentProduct

      public ApiResponse<PaymentProduct> getPaymentProduct(String productId, android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves a single PaymentProduct from the Online Payments gateway including all its fields.
      Parameters:
      productId - used to retrieve the PaymentProduct that is associated with this id
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary data to retrieve a PaymentProduct
      Returns:
      PaymentProduct, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getPaymentProductNetwork

      @Deprecated public ApiResponse<PaymentProductNetworkResponse> getPaymentProductNetwork(String customerId, String productId, CurrencyCode currencyCode, CountryCode countryCode, android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext)
      Deprecated.
      use getPaymentProductNetwork(String, Context, PaymentContext) instead
      Retrieves a single Payment Product Network from the Online Payments gateway.
      Parameters:
      customerId - for which customer the network must be retrieved
      productId - the product of the id for which the network must be retrieved
      currencyCode - for which CurrencyCode the network must be retrieved
      countryCode - for which CountryCode the network must be retrieved
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary data to retrieve a PaymentProduct
      Returns:
      PaymentProduct, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getPaymentProductNetwork

      @Deprecated public ApiResponse<PaymentProductNetworkResponse> getPaymentProductNetwork(String customerId, String productId, String currencyCode, String countryCode, android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext)
      Deprecated.
      use getPaymentProductNetwork(String, Context, PaymentContext) instead
      Retrieves a single Payment Product Network from the Online Payments gateway.
      Parameters:
      customerId - for which customer the network must be retrieved
      productId - the product of the id for which the network must be retrieved
      currencyCode - for which the network must be retrieved
      countryCode - for which the network must be retrieved
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary data to retrieve a PaymentProduct
      Returns:
      PaymentProduct, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getPaymentProductIdByCreditCardNumber

      public ApiResponse<IinDetailsResponse> getPaymentProductIdByCreditCardNumber(String partialCreditCardNumber, android.content.Context context, PaymentContext paymentContext)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves the IIN details as a IinDetailsResponse for the entered partial credit card number.
      Parameters:
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      partialCreditCardNumber - entered partial credit card number for which the IinDetailsResponse should be retrieved
      paymentContext - PaymentContext which contains all necessary data to retrieve the IinDetailsResponse
      Returns:
      IinDetailsResponse which contains the result of the IIN lookup, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getPublicKey

      public ApiResponse<PublicKeyResponse> getPublicKey(android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated.

      Returns:

    • getSurchargeCalculation

      public ApiResponse<com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.model.surcharge.response.SurchargeCalculationResponse> getSurchargeCalculation(AmountOfMoney amountOfMoney, com.onlinepayments.sdk.client.android.model.surcharge.request.CardSource cardSource, android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves the Surcharge Calculation as a SurchargeCalculationResponse for the provided amount of money, partial credit card number and payment product ID.
      Parameters:
      amountOfMoney - contains the amount and currency code for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      cardSource - contains the card or token for which the Surcharge should be calculated
      context - used for reading device metadata which is sent to the Online Payments gateway
      Returns:
      SurchargeCalculationResponse which contains the result of the Surcharge Calculation, wrapped as ApiResponse, with errors if those occurred

    • getMetadata

      public Map<String,String> getMetadata(android.content.Context context)
      Deprecated.
      Returns a map of metadata of the device this SDK is running on. The map contains the SDK version, OS, OS version and screen size.
      Parameters:
      context - used for retrieving device metadata
      Returns:
      a Map containing key/values of metadata
